Name: Dwarves Craft. Mountain Brothers
About the game: Crafty dwarf Corey went looking for the legendary craftsmen of the Northern Ridge in the hope of learning their crafts! Join him on this exciting journey, meet new friends, explore enchanting places, and find the Heart of the Mountain! 150 colored nonogram puzzles of all difficulty levels, a compelling story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a lot of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself! Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help the dwarves explore and repair the ancient halls of the Mountain Kingdom! - 150 colorful and memorable levels! - Striking visual effects! - Explore the Mountain Kingdom! - Find the Heart of the Mountain! - An exciting adventure! - Rich colors and amazing locations! - Improve your logical and abstract thinking! - User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
